nodes.title: Continue with Google
nodes.observations:
Sign In screen contains:
- Email input field
- Password input field
- "Forgot Password?" link
- Alternative sign-in options: appears to be Facebook and other social providers
- Back button in top left
- "New to Tubi?" text with Sign Up link

Screen layout follows standard Material Design patterns for authentication forms. All text is legible and properly contrasted.

nodes.title: Email
nodes.observations:
Password Reset screen contains:
- Email input field
- "Reset Password" button
- Clear instructions about password reset process
- Back button to return to sign in
- Clean, focused layout with single purpose

nodes.title: Sign in - Google Accounts
nodes.observations:
Search screen contains:
- Prominent search bar at top
- Mic icon for voice search
- Trending searches section
- Popular categories/genres
- Recent searches (empty initially)
- Clean layout with proper spacing and touch targets

nodes.title: Unknown Screen
nodes.observations:
Content detail screen shows:
- Large hero image/poster
- Title and year
- Genre tags
- Rating and duration
- Synopsis/description
- Cast and crew information
- Play button
- Share button
- Similar content suggestions
- Material Design layout with proper typography and spacing
